text: clude undifferentiated pleomorphic sarcoma /malignant fibrous histiocytoma (high-grade). There is no standard treatment for these tumors. Treatment may include the following:               - A clinical trial of targeted therapy, radiation therapy, and surgery with or without chemotherapy.               See the PDQ summary on Osteosarcoma and Malignant Fibrous Histiocytoma of Bone Treatment for information about the treatment of malignant fibrous histiocytoma of bone.          Blood Vessel Tumors
